parse.title: List of people with the longest marriages

text.*:
This list contains marriages which have been reported as setting records for length, both extant and historical (by order of length). The length of marriage is based on the reported death of either member, or reported divorce, or the most recent report that both members of the couple were still living.

No. Names Date of marriage Length of marriage
(at date of last report or death) 		Residence
(at date of record or death) 		Record Notes
1 Karam Chand
Kartari Chand 		11 December 1925 7004331630000000000♠90 years, 291 days Bradford, England, United Kingdom "Thought to be the longest-married couple in the world" (12 December 2014)[1]

"World's oldest married couple" (10 June 2015)[2]

[1][2][3][4][5][6]
2 K. Philipose Thomas
Sosamma Thomas 		17 February 1918 7004321440000000000♠88 years, 2 days[7] Kerala, India "World's longest married couple" (21 February 2006)[7] [8][7]
3 Herbert Fisher, Sr.
Zelmyra (née George) Fisher 		13 May 1924 7004317010000000000♠86 years, 290 days[9] North Carolina, United States "Longest marriage for a living couple" (2010-2)[10]
"Oldest living couple" (28 February 2011)[9] 		[10][9]
4 Dr. Sir Temulji Bhicaji Nariman
Lady Nariman[11][12][13] 		1853 7004316240000000000♠86 years, 214 days+[11] Maharashtra, India "World's record for the longest married life" (2 August 1940)[11]
5 Liu Yung-Yang
Liu Yang Yang-Wan[14][15] 		10 March 1917 7004315440000000000♠86 years, 133 days[14] Taoyuan, Taiwan "World's longest-lasting marriage" (23 July 2003)[14]
6 John George Betar
Ann (née Shawah) Betar[16][17][18][19][20] 		25 November 1932 7004313390000000000♠85 years, 293 days Connecticut, United States "America's longest-married couple" (22 November 2013)[18][20]
7 Duranord Veillard
Jeanne Veillard[21][22][23][24][25][26] 		29 November 1932 7004312300000000000♠85 years, 184 days New York, United States "Rockland County's oldest married couple" (26 February 2015)
"Rockland's oldest married couple" (7 June 2018) 		[21][26]
8 Lazarus Rowe
Mary (née Webber) Rowe[27][28][29] 		1743 7004312240000000000♠85 years, 178 days+[27] New Hampshire, United States "It is presumed the United States do not contain another man and wife, who have lived so long in the conjugal state" (1829)[30]
9 Mario Calì
Antonina Ardilio[31][32] 		19 November 1931 7004310090000000000♠84 years, 328 days Sicily, Italy "Longest marriage in Europe" (19 November 2015)[31][32]
10 Maurice Kaye
Helen Kaye[33][34][35][36] 		27 August 1934 7004306460000000000♠83 years, 330 days Bournemouth, England, United Kingdom "One of Britain's longest-married couples" (27 August 2014)[34]
"Believed to be Britain's longest married couple" (1 September 2017)[35]
"Britain's Longest-Married Man" (24 July 2018)[36]
11 William J. Jones
Eluned Jones[37] 		3 February 1923 7004304850000000000♠83 years, 169 days[37] England, United Kingdom "World's longest marriage" (22 July 2006)[37]
12 William B. Ritchie
Claudia Lillian Ritchie[38] 		12 April 1919 7004303730000000000♠83 years, 57 days[38] Kentucky, United States "World's oldest married couple" (8 June 2002)[38]
13 Norman James Burmah
Norma "Mickey" (née Depland) Burmah[39][40][41] 		27 January 1931 7004305380000000000♠83 years, 222 days Louisiana, United States "Longest known married couple in the United States" (20 February 2014)[41]
14 Marshall N. Kuykendall
Winifred Louisiana "Winnie Louise" (née Macnab) Kuykendall[42] 		14 February 1929 7004305360000000000♠83 years, 221 days New Mexico, United States "Longest-married American couple" (8 February 2011)[42]
15 George L. Briant
Germaine (née Thibodeaux) Briant[43] 		20 July 1921 7004305080000000000♠83 years, 192 days Louisiana, United States "Louisiana's oldest married couple" (2 February 2005)[43]
16 Steven "Steve" Wrubel
Victoria Virginia "Vicky" (née Puvalowski) Wrubel[44][45][46] 		28 September 1929 7004305080000000000♠83 years, 192 days Florida, United States "Most enduring marriage in the United States" (8 April 2013)[46]
17 Edd Hollen
Margaret (née Gray) Hollen[47][48] 		7 May 1889 7004304390000000000♠83 years, 124 days Kentucky, United States "Believed to be world record" (17 December 1971)[48]
18 George Cuthbert Clarence Vail
Mayme Lillie (née Arcand) Vail[49] 		17 February 1925 7004304330000000000♠83 years, 118 days Minnesota, United States "Longest married couple in [United States]" (14 February 2008)[49]
19 Giovanni J. Rocchio
Amelia Antonelli Rocchio[50][51] 		10 February 1923 7004304320000000000♠83 years, 116 days Rhode Island, United States "World's longest marriage?" (29 June 2005)[51]
20 Paul Murray Whiteman
Ellenor (née Lawson) Whiteman[52][53][54][55][56][57][58] 		11 January 1930 7004304070000000000♠83 years, 91 days West Virginia, United States "Longest marriage in West Virginia" (20 May 2012)[55]
21 Thommen Thomas
Aley (née Thomman) Thomas[59] 		13 February 1932 7004302980000000000♠82 years, 347 days Thodupuzha, Kerala, India "Perhaps the longest married couple in India" (21 March 2015)[59]
22 Roy T. Edgmon
Vola Gracie (née Watson) Edgmon[60][61][62][63] 		28 May 1933 7004302630000000000♠82 years, 313 days Arkansas, United States "Longest marriage in Arkansas" (10 February 2012)[60]
23 Ignacy Stasiak
Stefania (née Sałata) Stasiak[64][65][66][67] 		1 February 1931 7004302220000000000♠82 years, 271 days Aleksandrów Łódzki, Poland "Oldest married couple in Europe" (1 February 2013)[66]
24 Huang Fu
Gan Fu[68] 		1920 7004301500000000000♠82 years, 200 days+
(as of 19 July 2003) 		Guangdong, China "Claim they have one of the world's longest marriages" (19 July 2003)[68]
25 Harold Leroy Owings
Edna Pauline (née Stevens) Owings[69][70][71][72] 		26 November 1931 7004301490000000000♠82 years, 198 days California, United States "Eighth-longest married couple in the world and the fourth longest in the U.S." (2013-11-25)[70]
26 Joseph "Joe" or "Joze" Zekulich
Rose "Ruzha" (née Beus) Zekulich[73][74][75][76][77][78][79] 		25 May 1931 7004301280000000000♠82 years, 177 days Western Australia, Australia "Australia's longest married couple ever" (2013)[76]
27 Salus Fred William Newquest
Minnie Claude (née Pruitt) Newquest[80] 		20 January 1900 7004301220000000000♠82 years, 172 days Arkansas, United States "One of the longest marriages ever" (14 July 1982)[80]
28 Zhang Mucheng
Xu Dongying[81][82][83] 		October 1930 7004300840000000000♠82 years, 133 days+ Shanghai, China "Only "centenarian couple" in Shanghai" (11 March 2013)[82]
29 Edmund S. Sobieski
Genevieve (née Skumurski) Sobieski[84] 		13 January 1917 7004299620000000000♠82 years, 12 days New York, United States "Longest marriage in America" (5 July 2000)[84]
30 Oliver J. Glenn
Cora Lee Glenn[85] 		6 November 1904 7004299530000000000♠82 years, 3 days[85] Alabama, United States "[United States'] longest married couple" (9 November 1986)[85]
31 James Frederick Burgess
Sarah Ann (née Gregory) Burgess[86][87][88] 		21 June 1883 7004299520000000000♠82 years, 2 days England, United Kingdom "Believed to be Britain's longest married couple" (25 June 1965)[87]
32 Lee Hoon-yo
Kim Bong-geum[89] 		25 October 1919 7004299510000000000♠82 years, 0 days+
(as of 25 October 2001) 		Chungbuk, Korea "Korea's oldest married couple" (25 October 2001)[89]
33 Willis Clyde Barnes
Marie Kathrine (née Bullock) Barnes[90][91] 		20 September 1928 7004299330000000000♠81 years, 348 days Utah, United States "Utah's longest-married couple" (11 February 2010)[91]
34 Calvin "Cal" M. Blouch, Sr.
Josephine R. (née White) Blouch[92][93][94][95] 		26 March 1932 7004299160000000000♠81 years, 331 days Pennsylvania, United States "Likely 2nd-longest married U.S. couple" (22 March 2013)[94]
35 Ernest A. Scott
Maud (née Seidler) Scott[96] 		16 June 1909 7004299150000000000♠81 years, 330 days California, United States "One of the world's longest marriages" (11 June 1989)[96]
36 Peter Peterson
Celestia (née Terry) Peterson[97][98][99] 		11 December 1878 7004299050000000000♠81 years, 321 days Utah, United States "[United States'] longest wed couple" (8 November 1961)[99]
37 Theodore "Ted" C. Rortvedt
Alice Irene (née Lenz) Rortvedt[100][101][102] 		9 May 1932 7004298940000000000♠81 years, 309 days Wisconsin, United States "The 17th longest-married couple in the world" (15 May 2012)[101]
38 Marlo Keith Schermerhorn
Cleta Belle (née Dromgoole) Schermerhorn[103][104][105][106][107] 		29 June 1932 7004298670000000000♠81 years, 282 days Massachusetts, United States "Among the oldest couples still alive" (5 July 2012)[105]
39 Rowland Charles Rowly Olarenshaw
Elsie May (née Hood) Olarenshaw[108][109][110][111][112] 		11 November 1933 7004298030000000000♠81 years, 218 days Victoria, Australia "Australia's longest married couple" (27 June 2014)[109]
40 Angelo Minato
Amabile Rosa (née Crosato) Minato[113][114][115][116][117][118][119][120] 		30 November 1929 7004298010000000000♠81 years, 216 days Aquitaine, France "The oldest couple in Europe" (28 November 2010)[115]
41 Martin Terry
Christine Terry[121] 		7 February 1924 7004297710000000000♠81 years, 185 days South Carolina, United States "Undoubtedly one of the longest marriages in the United States" (2005-2-14)[121]
42 Ole Sholberg
Ottilie (née Riedel) Sholberg[122] 		5 January 1886 7004297630000000000♠81 years, 179 days Minnesota, United States "One of the world's most enduring marriages" (6 July 1967)[122]
43 Ralph Chester Richards, Sr.
Dorothy Dottie (née Renz) Richards[123][124] 		28 February 1930 7004297440000000000♠81 years, 159 days Louisiana, United States "State winners of Worldwide Marriage Encounter's “Longest Married Couple” contest" (8 February 2011)[42]
44 Frank Milford
Anita (née Pile) Milford[125][126][127] 		26 May 1928 7004296820000000000♠81 years, 97 days England, United Kingdom "Britain's longest-married couple" (1 September 2009)[126]
45 Ivan Yoshio Nishimura
Doris Yoshiko (née Takeshita) Nishimura[128][129] 		July 1930 7004296780000000000♠81 years, 93 days+ Hawaii, United States "State winners of Worldwide Marriage Encounter's “Longest Married Couple” contest" (8 February 2011)[42]
46 Justo Galindo Barba
Lucía Rodríguez Barba[130][131][132][133] 		2 September 1932 7004296720000000000♠81 years, 87 days Extremadura, Spain "Longest marriage in Spain" (2 September 2013)[133]
47 Samuel "Sam" L. Weiss
Blanche Weiss[134][135][136] 		18 March 1934 7004296160000000000♠81 years, 31 days California, United States "Surely one of San Diego's longest married couples" (13 March 2014)[134]
48 Calvin Elmer Dunmire
Mina L. (née Boarts) Dunmire[137] 		24 April 1906 7004295110000000000♠80 years, 291 days Pennsylvania, United States "Nation's longest-wed" (9 February 1987)[137]
